description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A Bat and Ball Game in Classic Arcade styling. Fully Human simulated AI opponents. Can you beat them ? A feature rich game including Multibats, multiball, shaped bats and much more. Come play the challenge of the Computer AI, and if they are too much for you. Get a friend to help out in Cooperative mode. Aceball is a polished and feature rich arcade challenge
